item.title: Trump floats new tariffs in push to acquire Greenland
item.description: The comments show Trump considering applying his aggressive tariff strategies to his efforts to acquire Greenland.

item.title: Russia says it's monitoring Trump's 'extraordinary' push to take over Greenland
item.description: The Kremlin called Trump's threats to take over Greenland "extraordinary" on Friday, adding that Moscow will continue to closely monitor the situation...

item.title: Machado presents her Nobel award to Trump, prompting incredulity in Norway
item.description: "This is incredibly embarrassing," Raymond Johansen, a Norwegian lawmaker for the center-left Labour Party, said in a Facebook post.

item.title: South Korea's ex-president Yoon given 5-year jail term in first ruling over martial law
item.description: A South Korean court on Friday sentenced former president Yoon Suk Yeol to five years in prison following his failed bid to impose martial law.

item.title: Trump accepts Nobel medal from Venezuelan opposition leader Machado
item.description: Venezuelan opposition leader Maria Corina Machado said she presented U.S. President Donald Trump with her Nobel Peace Prize medal during their meeting...
